Event.name: Releasing_from_custody
Event.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Authorities</fen> release a <fen>Suspect</fen> who has been held under suspicion of having committed a crime.</def-root>

Arg.name: Authorities
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Authorities</fen> are those who have the official authority to release a <fen>Suspect</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Auth">The police</fex> <t>released</t> the suspect.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Suspect
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Suspect</fen> is the person released by the <fen>Authorities</fen>, having been held under suspicion of having committed a crime.
<ex>The police <t>released</t> <fex name="Susp">the suspect</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Manner</fen> is the way in which the <fen>Authorities</fen> release the <fen>Suspect</fen>.
<ex>The police <t>released</t> the suspect <fex name="Manner">carefully</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Means</fen> identifies the means by which the <fen>Authorities</fen> release the <fen>Suspect</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Explanation
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Explanation</fen> identifies the reason for which the <fen>Authorities</fen> are releasing the <fen>Suspect</fen>.
<ex>The police <t>released</t> the suspect <fex name="Explanation"> because he had a good alibi</fex>.</ex> </def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Purpose</fen> identifies the purpose for which the <fen>Authorities</fen> release the <fen>Suspect</fen>. </def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Place</fen> identifies the place where the <fen>Authorities</fen> release the <fen>Suspect</fen> . </def-root>

Arg.name: Holding_location
Arg.definition: <def-root>The place that the <fen>Suspect</fen> is no longer confined to.</def-root>
